description:
A network of trails through dense forest with a view of Castlegar. 
Check out the friends of Castlegar trails community site for more information.
http://www.friendsoftrails.org/pages/Merry_Creek.html
directions: Leave Castlegar on Hwy 3 heading towards Grand Forks. Turn right 1/2 km past the Timberland Motel on Merry Creek Forest Service Road. Drive 2 km to parking area.
title: Merry Creek
